name: Option Credit Spread Test
description: Test case for placing a credit spread order through agent interaction

parts.text: Create a credit spread by selling the Microsoft $400 call and buying the $410 call, both expiring next Friday, for 3 contracts at $2.50 net credit.
I need the specific option instrument IDs for both legs of the credit spread. Can you provide the instrument IDs for the MSFT $400 call and $410 call options expiring next Friday?
